def_cn: （手心向内的）V字手势，粗鲁（下流）的手势
def_en: In Britain, a V-sign is a rude gesture which is made by sticking up your first two fingers in a V shape, with the palm of your hand facing you.

def_cn: （手心向外的）V字手势，胜利手势
def_en: A V-sign is a gesture which is made by sticking up your first two fingers in a V shape, with the palm of your hand facing away from you, as a sign of victory.
